radiographic_examinations.findings: Fetal goiter diagnosed, initially measuring 32/16 mm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Second ultrasound at 27 weeks gestation showed further enlargement of the goiter to 34/21 mm, and later it measured 30/18 mm during the eighth month.

radiographic_examinations.findings: High serum TSH (336 mU/liter) and undetectable free T4 levels indicating fetal hypothyroidism.
Elevated serum TSH (472 mU/liter) and low free T4 levels (6.5 pmol/liter), confirming fetal hypothyroidism.
